typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Game has already begun, cannot register now"

arguments.value: Game has already begun, cannot register now

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Game has already begun, cannot register now"

nodes.documentation:
registerPlayer for registering the player before starting the game
 unregistered players will not be allowed in the game after the game has begun.
nodes.name: registerPlayer

nodes.documentation: resetRound to reset after termination of each round, i.e. after a challenge has been called.
nodes.name: resetRound

nodes.documentation:
roll function is a playable event to roll the dice.
 to keep the rolls secret, no one must know the outcome of the rolls,
 so we use random number generation inside solidity for the same.
nodes.name: roll

nodes.documentation: Transfer the payment pool to the winner of each round.
nodes.name: transferPool

nodes.documentation:
revealDie to reveal the dice of all the players only AFTER the termination of the round.
 termination of round kept in check with the fetchable variable
nodes.name: revealDie

nodes.documentation:
getRoundWinner evaluates the winner as well as the loser of the round.
 The money pool is transferred to the winner.
 The loser loses a dice.
nodes.name: getRoundWinner
